attributes.action: Make use of a Slingshot or Catapult illegal
attributes.additional_details: The only way the use of such weapons can be stopped is by it being brought to Government and made law.
attributes.background: The use of catapults and slingshots have blighted rural areas for too long, providing silent weapons which cause significant harm, damage and loss to our communities.
